topStories.title: Obesity strategy 'includes 20% sugar cuts'
topStories.summary: The long-awaited childhood obesity strategy for England will outline measures to cut sugar content in food and drink by 20% over four years but will not include curbs on junk food TV adverts, the BBC understands.
